NEETRAC is a part of the School of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the Georgia Institute of Technology. It is a preeminent center in the US for applied research and testing in the field of electric energy distribution and transmission. critical_alerts.headline: EIT Certification Critical for Hiring Opportunities

critical_alerts.action: Prioritize obtaining EIT certification alongside FE exam preparation to enhance employability at target employers.
